data.title: Maria Schell - Trivia, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Maria Schell: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

An Austrian/Swiss film actress who has starred in several movies including Gervaise, The Brothers Karamazov, and has even starred in American films such as the 1978 adaptation of Superman and The Hanging Tree. In 1956, she was awarded the Volpi Cup for Best Actress at Venice Film Festival for her performance in Gervaise.

Before Fame

She attended her mother's acting school in Vienna.

Trivia

Her brother Maximilian's 2002 documentary film My Sister Maria was her final on-screen appearance.

Family Life

Her mother was Margarethe Nordberg, an actress who taught at an acting school, and her father was Hermann Ferdinand Schell, a swiss poet and novelist.

Associated With
